an7.47:1.1: Tena → ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena (bj, s1-3)
an7.47:7.1: samārambhati → samārabbhati (si, pts1, mr) | samārabhati (s1-3), hantuṃ → haññantu (si, s1-3, pts1), yaññatthāya → yaññatthāyāti (bj, s1-3)
an7.47:17.5: vāto → vāyo (bj), upavāyatan”ti → vāyatūti (bj) | upavāyatūti (s1-3, pts1, mr)
